wikipedia_page.main: Major General Sir Henry Guy Riley KBE CB (1884–1964) was a senior British Army officer during the Second World War.

response: * Major-General Henry Guy Riley, Royal Army Pay Corps, Chief Paymaster at the War Office and Inspector of Army Pay Offices.
